mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.import_way AS "importWay", a.update_counts AS "updateCounts", a.after_update_counts AS "afterUpdateCounts", a.this_update_inven_total AS "thisUpdateInvenTotal", a.after_update_all_inven_total AS "afterUpdateAllInvenTotal", a.log_time AS "logTime", a.operator AS "operator"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_inventory_log( id, channel_id, channel_name, import_way, update_counts, after_update_counts, this_update_inven_total, after_update_all_inven_total, log_time, operator ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{channelId}, #{channelName}, #{importWay}, #{updateCounts}, #{afterUpdateCounts}, #{thisUpdateInvenTotal}, #{afterUpdateAllInvenTotal}, #{logTime}, #{operator} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_inventory_log SET channel_id = #{channelId}, channel_name = #{channelName}, import_way = #{importWay}, update_counts = #{updateCounts}, after_update_counts = #{afterUpdateCounts}, this_update_inven_total = #{thisUpdateInvenTotal}, after_update_all_inven_total = #{afterUpdateAllInvenTotal}, log_time = #{logTime}, operator = #{operator} WHERE id = #{id}
